description: A flexible help system for your bot

attachments.text: See how long this bot has been running
attachments.title: uptime

attachments.text: Who is this bot, anyways?
attachments.title: identify

attachments.text: The bot will repeat after you
attachments.title: say <something>

attachments.text: Customize me!
attachments.title: My Custom Command

attachments.text: Customize Me!
attachments.title: My Custom Command

text:
I'm here to help! Here are some of the commands that come standard with my starter kit.

You can say `help <command>` to get more details.
As you add features and adapt me to be _your own bot_, you should update my help system <https://studio.botkit.ai|via the Botkit Studio dialog editor.>
My uptime command displays information about my application process.
You can make me say silly things.
As a Botkit-powered robot, I am required to identify myself when asked.
Say `@{{identity.name}} identify yourself` or `@{{identity.name}} who are you?`

description: Script for welcoming new users to your bot

attachments.text: Watch this intro video to learn about where you are and what you are meant to do.
attachments.title: Welcome to SlackTime

description: What the bot says if no other trigger matches

text: I apologize, but my circuits have not been configured for that input. Say `help` for information about my current capabilities.
Looks like you got distracted. We can continue later.

attachments.title: Safe
attachments.text: There is a combination lock, and also a sticky note!
Not quite...
attachments.title: Safe

attachments.text: The safe pops open and… it’s empty. But wait, the bottom of the safe actually looks like a shaft dropping downward. And there is a ladder.
attachments.title: Safe

attachments.text: The safe pops open and… it’s empty. But wait, the bottom of the safe actually looks like a shaft dropping downward. And there is a ladder.
attachments.title: Someone on your team has already unlocked the safe!

attachments.text: You are in a room with four white walls. On each wall is a picture frame. One frame shows a digital slideshow of *strange symbols*. Another frame has a painting of *many dots*. Another frame has an abstract painting of *swirling glyphs*. Finally, there is a frame with a painting of a *few dots*. In the middle of the room are six *buttons*. Beside that, is a table with a few pages resting on it. Select a choice in the menu and go.
attachments.title: The Room
The Room
attachments.text: You look around the room again. You are in a room with four white walls. On each wall is a picture frame. One frame shows a digital slideshow of *strange symbols*. Another frame has a painting of *many dots*. Another frame has an abstract painting of *swirling glyphs*. Finally, there is a frame with a painting of a *few dots*. In the middle of the room are six *buttons*. Beside that, is a table with a few pages resting on it. Select a choice in the menu and go.

attachments.title: Node 3 - Main Room
attachments.text: You look around the room again. One frame shows a digital slideshow of safari animals. Another frame has a painting of many dots. Another frame has a painting of glyphs. Finally, in the last frame is *a hole* where the few dots painting used to be. In the middle of the room are nine buttons. Select a choice in the menu and go.

attachments.title: Node 3 - Main Room
attachments.text: You look around the room again. One frame shows *a video* where the digital slideshow of safari animals used to be. Another frame has a painting of many dots. Another frame has *strange glyphs*. Finally, in the last frame is *a hole* where the few dots painting used to be. In the middle of the room are nine buttons. Select a choice in the menu and go.

You are in a room with four white walls. On each wall is a picture frame. One frame shows a *hole* in the wall where the slideshow of strange symbols used to be. There is a *safe* behind where the many dots used to be. The *glyphs* are no longer swirling and are now organized in a decipherable way. Finally, in the last frame is a painting of *stars* where the few dots painting used to be. In the middle of the room are six *buttons*. Beside that, is a *table* with a few pages resting on it. Select a choice in the menu and go.
attachments.title: The Room
Button Matrix
attachments.text: Here are the nine buttons. They change colors: grey, green, and red. Press them to change colors.
The air hums electrically, and a glowing orb appears in your hand. The orb fits snugly in your palm, shedding a faint light. What might you want to light up with a glowing ball?
attachments.title: You entered a correct button sequence
You entered a correct button sequence
attachments.text: The animal pictures are replaced by a video.

attachments.title: You entered a correct button sequence
attachments.text: You hear a faint click from a “random” direction.

attachments.title: You entered a correct button sequence
attachments.text: The room starts to rumble… The small dots painting falls of the wall. There is a hole there.

attachments.title: You entered a correct button sequence
attachments.text: The room starts to rumble… The abstract symbol begins to shift. The glyphs form a circle and one symbol stands out in the center.

attachments.title: Button Matrix
attachments.text: Nothing happens...

attachments.title: You already entered that code! Here's a recap:

attachments.text: It’s one of this digital picture frames…. Pictures of nine animals pop up for a few seconds each in a slideshow. A Parrot, Iguana, Frog, Rhino, Elephant,  Snake, Flamingo, Alligator and another Elephant. There is also a plaque next to the painting. Want to look at any of them more closely?
attachments.title: Safari Slideshow
The safari slideshow has turned into a safari video
Downloads:
attachments.text: These look important

attachments.title: Plaque
attachments.text: “Really Great Game Records”

attachments.title: Many Dots
attachments.text: You see a stunning abstract painting composed of bold dots in three colors: Red, Grey, and Green. It’s signed by the artist: Daedalus. A plaque is affixed to the wall beside it. There’s some writing.

attachments.title: Few Dots
attachments.text: Looks like the many dots painting but it's smaller. There is a plaque with something written on it.
There is a hole in the wall. In it are some documents and a ring!!! These look important. You should download them.
attachments.title: Hole

attachments.text: Looks like the many dots painting but it's smaller. Hey, the plaque is gone! Oh, there it is on the floor. It must have fallen off.
attachments.title: Few Dots Painting

attachments.text: There is a hole in the wall. In it are some documents and a ring!!! These look important. You should download them. The plaque is still on the floor, too.
attachments.title: Hole

attachments.text: This looks important. You should probably download it.

attachments.text: You can now reach out to Wade or Sam for your prize!
